mapper.select:
SELECT G.GOODS_NUM, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_DATE, G.GOODS_COUNT, G.GOODS_IMAGE, G.GOODS_CATE, A.GOODS_WEIGHT, A.GOODS_ATT_AMOUNT
FROM GOODS G, GOODS_ATTRIBUTE A WHERE G.GOODS_NUM = A.GOODS_NUM
ORDER BY G.GOODS_NUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET GOODS_NAME = #{GOODS_NAME}, GOODS_CONTENT = #{GOODS_CONTENT}, GOODS_PRICE = #{GOODS_PRICE}, GOODS_DATE = sysdate, GOODS_CATE = #{GOODS_CATE}, GOODS_IMAGE = #{GOODS_IMAGE}, GOODS_CONTENTIMAGE = 'B', GOODS_POINT = #{GOODS_PRICE}*0.01 WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}
UPDATE GOODS_ATTRIBUTE SET GOODS_STATUS = '1' WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}
